pricing.discountPolicy: Max discretionary discount 10% with PM + Director approval

effort.overagePolicy: If any role approaches 85% of hourCap, PM initiates change order before exceeding.

deliverables: Logo system: primary, horizontal, and mark variants (vector)
Accessible color palette (core + neutrals) with AA/AAA guidance
Typography pairing (display + body) with usage notes
requirements: Any legacy assets (logos, colors, fonts) if applicable
Top 3 primary use-cases (website, deck, social, product)
outOfScope: Full brand guidelines book (12–20 pp) — available as add-on
Custom font licensing purchases (client to procure)
Multiple logo families beyond one primary
assumptions: Two-week sprint with timely feedback within 1 business day
One primary logo family; up to 8 basic icons
Delivery in English; single brand/primary product line

timeline.title: Discovery & Direction
timeline.notes: Questionnaire review, references, goals, constraints, success metrics

timeline.title: Design Sprint & Concepts
timeline.notes: Logo explorations, palette & type pairing, initial guide scaffold

timeline.title: Revisions & Polish
timeline.notes: Two structured rounds; consolidate feedback; finalize selections

timeline.title: Finalization & Handoff
timeline.notes: Exports, Figma cleanup, guide PDF, handoff call + recording

checklist: Text and UI color pairs meet WCAG AA (AAA where practical)
Logo mark legible at 16–24 px (favicon/social avatar test)
All exports provided in SVG + PNG @1x/@2x
Figma file layers named and grouped; components used
Guide PDF accessible tags (headings, alt text for examples)
Spell check (US English) on guide and assets
File paths and naming match export presets
Icon grid and stroke weights consistent

changeRequests.policy: Changes outside the included two revision rounds or beyond scope require written approval via change order.
triggers: Scope increase (more icons, multiple families, additional language)

communications.cadence: Progress updates at concept handoff and prior to each review
communications.handoff: 30–45 min call with recording and Q&A

risks.mitigation: Require consolidated feedback and a single decision-maker
Confirm naming status at kickoff; treat later change as CO
Client responsible for clearance; provide alternate marks if required via CO

assetsAndLicensing: No plagiarism or reuse of proprietary marks
Paid fonts/licenses are client-procured unless otherwise agreed
legalEthics.dataRetention: Design sources retained for 12 months unless contract specifies otherwise

triggers: Team requests more usage examples → suggest Guidelines Pro
Desire for motion/launch assets → suggest Logo Animation
Need for narrative/voice → suggest Messaging Playbook

kpis: Cycle time (days) from kickoff to approval
analytics.tracking: Log milestones and approvals in project tracker; attach final assets and recording links

notesInternal: Protect hour caps to maintain >50% margin.
If client expects full guideline book, pivot to Pro upgrade early.
Keep icon scope simple; propose icon set add-on if style grows.
